message.body: Hey! How are you? How has your summer been treating you?
Woah! I was just thinking of you! I hung your paintings all over my house btw (I just moved)
They're hanging in our living room and hallways haha
I want to see pictures of them installed! Ha. How is your new place? I would like to visit soon!

Yup I am back in Ohio! Parents are giving me the basement to transform into a studio so I have been doing a lot of cleaning, organizing, and adding to my source material. My health is better and the medication so far is working for me! I started driving again since I have the seizures under control. Flying to Chicago August 30-September 8. Are there any days between September 9 through September 24th when you are particularly free??!
Ugh I'm so glad! I'll let you know my schedule ASAP
'statements of intent' Mark Godfrey on female painters of the 80s a. I think you would Really enjoy it.
Also I want to read this ASAP:
Okay!!! Awesome! I have been reading what feels to me to be 'a lot' of art criticism and history of painters. It sucks not living next to an art book dominated library
When I get my studio in my parents basement you should come,stay a while and paint with me!
I would love that! I will absolutely do that. Send me the criticism you are reading... I just met a writer for artfcity
